entities.name: Fang
entities.description: Fang is a dog who yelped and tried to run when he got lodged in thorns.

entities.name: Harry
entities.description: Harry is the one being called by Ron, and he blunders after Ron towards the light.

entities.name: Ron
entities.description: Ron shouts for Harry and leads him to their car.

entities.name: Mr Weasley's car
entities.description: The car is standing in a clearing, empty, with its headlamps ablaze.

entities.name: the Forest
entities.description: The Forest has turned Mr Weasley's car wild and it has been trundling around on its own.

relationships.description: The car belongs to Ron (implied by the context).
The Forest has turned Mr Weasley's car wild.
